ratings.comment: This class makes you really think. It makes you think maybe the entire ethnic studies program ought to be shuttered. This is my 2nd ethnic studies class, and I am realizing how much money I spend, the time I waste going to and from class, reading, studying for tests, for what. The "truth" is their truth, not universal truth. Disappointing.

Super nice guy but horrible, horrible lecturer. Couldn't sit through a single one after going to the first class. Would be a great TA but definitely not ready to be a professor. That said, he is pretty dreamy looking!

Among the worst professors I've had in my college career.  Assigns several hours of pointless reading per class, then asks vague, unanswerable questions about it.  Find another ethnic studies class to take.
